head.title: Asian Noodle Salad with Chiles and Peanuts

ing.item: Balsamic vinegar or red wine vinegar
Dry roasted peanuts, lightly salted; chopped coarsely lightly salted; chopped coarsely lightly salted; chopped coarsely

directions.step:
Cook noodles or spaghetti until just tender. Drain. Rinse with cold water until cool. Drain well. Transfer to large bowl. Combine sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar, vinegar and salt in small bowl. Stir to dissolve sugar. Add to noodles. Add choppped cilantro, chiles, and onions. Mix well. Sprinkle peanuts over individual salads.
